reviewtext: I bought two of these on for my self and one for my girl friend so we had something to use while we were out in the boat fishing and we could view birds or other boats on the lake to see what they were doing. My girl friend reall loves hers. She has used it to just look at diffrent things while we were on a small trip in the car.Would buy again.....carry mine in my fishing bag so I have it with at all times.
